name: Bana the Banana
description:
Bana was made for A Game By It's Cover Jam 2017!

A small banana must gather up crystals for some unknown reason. Between him and his target are grimbles who'd do anything to eat a non-sentient banana.

Controls:

WASD or arrows = Move

Q+E = Move Camera

LMB or I = Place Banana

Hold R = Restart

Esc = Menu

Made in Unity, Blender and Beepbox.
